actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT  ("Payment"."createdAt" + interval '330 minutes')::date as "date" , SUM("amount") as "Revenue"
FROM "Payment" 
where "Payment"."createdAt" >= {{moment(DatePicker1.selectedDate).format("YYYY-MM-DD")}}::date - interval '330 minutes' and "Payment"."createdAt" <= {{moment(DatePicker2.selectedDate).format("YYYY-MM-DD")}}::date + interval '1110 minutes'
and "status" = 'responseReceivedSuccess' 
and "paymentForId" IN ('3125', '3257','3488') 
GROUP BY "date"
ORDER BY 1 ASC;
